Changelog

RCarb 0.1.3 (2019-05-19)

New features

  • The reference dataset got a new dataset called Reference_Data$DR_conv_factors to support different dose rate conversion factors
  • The function model_DoseRate() gained are new argument DR_conv_factors to support different dose rate conversion factors

Bugfixes

  • If values for U-238 and U-234 were provided, for the gamma-dose rate contribution the water correction factors from the beta-dose contribution were used; now corrected (internal function .calc_DoseRata()). This bug already existed in Carb and was probably introduced by copy & paste actions.

Other modifications

  • Add README.md
  • Modify output graphics and add more information
  • Update dependency and package version requirements

RCarb 0.1.2 (2018-12-02)

  • Update internal references
  • Modify example in write_InputTemplate() to comply with CRAN requests

RCarb 0.1.1 (2018-11-20)

  • Internal changes only to account for CRAN comments on inital submission.

RCarb 0.1.0 (2018-11-12)

  • Initial version
